excerpt: "Crystal Group, Inc., a leading designer and manufacturer of rugged computer and electronic hardware, announced it is working with trucking companies—including TuSimple, the world’s largest and most advanced self-driving truck company—and robotics developers to accelerate the seamless AI-enabled performance of autonomous trucks and heavy construction machinery in demanding environments."
